seo.title: How coaching works with SustainSage | SustainSage
seo.description: Understand our ICF-aligned coaching approach, boundaries, ethics, and how to decide if coaching fits your current needs.

hero.title: How coaching works
hero.subtitle: ICF-aligned, client-led coaching. No promises we can’t keep—just honest partnership and clear boundaries.

definition.title: What we mean by “coaching”
items: We work with your thinking, patterns, choices; you own decisions and action.

steps.title: Free 20-min intro
steps.description: Fit, expectations, boundaries, package / no package. No obligation to continue.

steps.title: Contracting
steps.description: Topic, frequency, number of sessions, language, fees. We document what we agree.

steps.title: Sessions
steps.description: 50–60 mins, online, with simple reflection prompts. You set the focus each time.

steps.title: Between sessions
steps.description: Optional light check-ins when agreed. No surprise homework or pressure.

boundaries.title: What we will not do
items: No diagnosis, no making decisions for you, no guarantees of results.
No legal, immigration, or medical advice.
We name risk signals and encourage you to seek appropriate support when needed.

ethics.title: How we hold ethics
items: Based on the ICF Code of Ethics.
In multilingual, multicultural contexts we acknowledge power dynamics and systemic pressure.

selfCheck.title: Is coaching right for me now?
selfCheck.description: A quick self-check before you book. If several answers point to high distress or risk, please reach out to therapeutic or crisis resources first.
items: Am I dealing with immediate safety, legal, or medical risks that need specialised support?
Do I have the bandwidth to reflect and experiment between sessions, even in small ways?
Would I benefit more right now from therapy, supervision, or another resource focused on healing?
Do I want a space to make decisions I own, rather than someone telling me what to do?

packages.title: Which package fits?
packages.description: Each package keeps the same coaching principles and boundaries. Choose based on how much structure and time you want.

cards.title: Transition Coaching – 6 sessions
cards.description: Structured space to stabilise relocation or role change in the UK.

cards.title: Reset Sprint – 3 sessions
cards.description: Short, focused container to pause, sort and choose next steps.

cards.title: Deepening Practice – 8 sessions
cards.description: Longer-term partnership for leaders and practitioners refining their practice.

body.value: Ready to explore? The intro call is a chance to sense fit together—no pressure to commit.
